con:request.name: SubmitPPIPayment
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="https://www.velocitypayment.com/ws" xmlns:ppi="http://www.ePayments.com/PPI" xmlns:ppip="http://www.ePayments.com/PPIPayment">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:SubmitPPIPayment>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ws:token>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:UserName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#AT_Username}</ppi:UserName>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Password>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#AT_Password}</ppi:Password>\r <ppi:PPITransactionRequestId>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#AT_RequestID}</ppi:PPITransactionRequestId>\r <ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#AT_Identifier}</ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>\r </ws:token>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ws:payment Notes="${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#Notes}">\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:AdditionalInfo>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <ppi:Fees>\r <ppip:FeeType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#FeeType}</ppip:FeeType>\r <ppip:Amount>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#FeeAmount}</ppip:Amount>\r </ppi:Fees>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <ppi:PaymentSegment>\r <ppip:Amount>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#SegmentAmount}</ppip:Amount>\r <ppip:SegmentType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#SegmentType}</ppip:SegmentType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r </ppi:PaymentSegment>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:PaymentType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#PaymentType}</ppi:PaymentType>\r <ppi:ProcessDate>${DataGenDateTest#TodayDate}</ppi:ProcessDate>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r </ppi:AdditionalInfo>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Customer>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:AddressLine1>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_AL1}</ppi:AddressLine1>\r <ppi:AddressLine2>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_AL2}</ppi:AddressLine2>\r <ppi:Country>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Country}</ppi:Country>\r <ppi:EmailAddress>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Email}</ppi:EmailAddress>\r <ppi:FirstName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_FirstName}</ppi:FirstName>\r <ppi:LastName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_LastName}</ppi:LastName>\r <ppi:MiddleInitial>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_MI}</ppi:MiddleInitial>\r <ppi:Notes>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Notest}</ppi:Notes>\r <ppi:PhoneNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Phone}</ppi:PhoneNumber>\r <ppi:Zip>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_ZIP}</ppi:Zip>\r <ppi:Username>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Username}</ppi:Username>\r <ppi:Password>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_Password}</ppi:Password>\r </ppi:Customer>\r <ppi:ClientAccountNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_CAN}</ppi:ClientAccountNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_PreAuthOnly}</ppi:PreAuthorizeOnly>\r <ppi:PaymentSource>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#C_PaymentSource}</ppi:PaymentSource>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Payor>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:AccountName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_AccountName}</ppi:AccountName>\r <ppi:AddressLine1>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_AL1}</ppi:AddressLine1>\r <ppi:AddressLine2>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_AL2}</ppi:AddressLine2>\r <ppi:Country>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_Country}</ppi:Country>\r <ppi:PhoneNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_Phone}</ppi:PhoneNumber>\r <ppi:FirstName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_FirstName}</ppi:FirstName>\r <ppi:LastName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_LastName}</ppi:LastName>\r <ppi:MiddleInitial>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_MI}</ppi:MiddleInitial>\r <ppi:EmailAddress>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_Email}</ppi:EmailAddress>\r <ppi:ZipCode>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_ZIP}</ppi:ZipCode>\r <ppi:BusinessName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_BusinessName}</ppi:BusinessName>\r <ppi:IsBusinessName>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#P_IsBusiness}</ppi:IsBusinessName>\r </ppi:Payor>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppi:Vehicle>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppip:AbaNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_ABA}</ppip:AbaNumber>\r <ppip:AccountType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_AccountType}</ppip:AccountType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppip:CheckNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_CheckNumber}</ppip:CheckNumber>\r <ppip:CheckType>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_CheckType}</ppip:CheckType>\r <ppip:CheckNumberPosition>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_CheckPos}</ppip:CheckNumberPosition>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ppip:CVV2Code>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_CVV}</ppip:CVV2Code>\r <ppip:ExpirationDate>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_ExpDate}</ppip:ExpirationDate>\r <ppip:PaymentVehicleNumber>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_VehicleNumber}</ppip:PaymentVehicleNumber>\r <ppip:PaymentMethodCategory>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_PMCategory}</ppip:PaymentMethodCategory>\r <ppip:EnforcePinDebitValidation>${DataSourceSubmitPPIPaymentPositive#V_EnforcePin}</ppip:EnforcePinDebitValidation>\r </ppi:Vehicle>\r </ws:payment>\r </ws:SubmitPPIPayment>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.script: def sdf = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd") return sdf.format(new Date()) + "T08:59:00.000-04:00"
